reviewText: This is a very nice Chinese fantasy movie.  The actors are very good and convincing.  The women here are all lovely, each of the women in the other world are named for flowers and that's about as much as I can say without giving away the main plot.  But this is a delight and more for those who are looking for a good story.  Although there is some action here, this is not a kung fu movie.  But it is very delightful.
